text: us din munaafiq mard wa aurath imaan waalo se kahenge ke hamaara intezaar to karo, ke hum bhi tumhaare noor se kuch roushni haasil karle, jawaab diya jayega ke tum apne piche laut jaao aur roushni talaash karo, phir un ke aur un ke darmiyaan ek diwaar haayel kardi jayegi, jis mein darwaaza bhi hoga, us ke androoni hisse mein to rehmath hogi aur baaher ki taraf azaab hoga
